message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $10000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss $9500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $9200?
I understand you're still a bit above budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $9300?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm really trying to stick to my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $9000?
I've made a few concessions already, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $9400. That's my final offer.
I've thought about it, and I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $9200?
